type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDependReports
type.description: * The reporting configuration for the {@link JDepend} task. * * Exactly one of the XML or HTML reports can be enabled when the task executes. If more than one or none is enabled, an {@link org.gradle.api.InvalidUserDataException} * will be thrown.

method.name: getText
method.description: * The jdepend text report * * @return The jdepend text report

method.name: getXml
method.description: * The jdepend XML report * * @return The jdepend XML report

property.name: text
property.description: * The jdepend text report * * @return The jdepend text report

property.name: xml
property.description: * The jdepend XML report * * @return The jdepend XML report
